subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. journeyman Shavlik Randolph, now a regular in Boston’s rotation, got his name from his grandfather, the all-American and 1956 first-round draft choice he never met.
snippet: The N.B.A. journeyman Shavlik Randolph, now a regular in Boston’s rotation, got his name from his grandfather, the all-American and 1956 first-round draft choice he never met.
